attributes.action: force electronic arts to sell some of their assets to reduce their monopoly and increase fairness and competiton in the computer game industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: electronic arts has a near monopoly status on the computer game industry in the world and this is keeping computer game prices up and it is bad for competition and it is bad for business so i think this government needs to step on behalf of businesses and gamers alike and restore balance to the industry as ea have too much assets and are buying out too many companies and like i said it is bad for business and it is bad for customers

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
